x86x64::InstInfoÂ¶

struct asmjit::x86x64::InstInfo
#include <x86defs.h>

X86 instruction information.

Public Functions

const char * getName()

Get instruction name string (null terminated string).

uint32_t _getNameIndex()

Get instruction name index (index to _instName array).

uint32_t getGroup()

Get instruction group, see kInstGroup.

uint32_t getFlags()

Get instruction flags, see kInstFlags.

bool isFlow()

Get whether the instruction is a control-flow intruction.

Control flow instruction is instruction that modifies instruction pointer, typically jmp, jcc, call, or ret.

bool isTest()

Get whether the instruction is a compare/test like intruction.

bool isMove()

Get whether the instruction is a typical Move instruction.

Move instructions typically overwrite the first operand, so it’s an useful hint for Compiler. Applies also to multimedia instruction - MMX, SSE, SSE2 and AVX moves).

bool isXchg()

Get whether the instruction is a typical Exchange instruction.

Exchange instructios are ‘xchg’ and ‘xadd’.

bool isFp()

Get whether the instruction accesses Fp register(s).

bool isLockable()

Get whether the instruction can be prefixed by LOCK prefix.

bool isSpecial()

Get whether the instruction is special type (this is used by Compiler to manage additional variables or functionality).

bool isSpecialMem()

Get whether the instruction is special type and it performs memory access.

Public Members

uint16_t _nameIndex

Instruction name index in _instName[] array.

uint16_t _flags

Instruction flags.

uint8_t _group

Instruction group, used also by Compiler.

uint8_t _reserved[3]

Reserved for future use.

uint16_t _opFlags[4]

Operands’ flags.

uint32_t _opCode[2]

Primary and secondary opcodes.
